versos: (furious) 2 Kings 19:28 - "Because your rage against me and your arrogance have reached my ears, I will put my hook in your nose and my bit in your mouth, and I will make you return by the way you came.";;;
(meats) 1 Corinthians 8:8 - "But meat commendeth us not to God: for neither, if we eat, are we the better; neither, if we eat not, are we the worse.";;;
(bold) Proverbs 28:1 - "The wicked flee when no one pursues, but the righteous are bold as a lion.";;;
(abound) "And I pray that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight," - Philippians 1:9;;;
(accuse) John 5:45 - "But do not think I will accuse you before the Father. Your accuser is Moses, on whom your hopes are set.";;;
(ship) Acts 27:2 - "We boarded a ship from Adramyttium about to sail for ports along the coast of the province of Asia, and we put out to sea.";;;
(preacher) 2 Timothy 4:2 - Preach the word; be prepared in season and out of season; correct, rebuke and encouragewith great patience and careful instruction.;;;
(bereave) Job 6:2 - "Oh that my grief were thoroughly weighed, and my calamity laid in the balances together";;;
(patient) Romans 12:12 - "Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.";;;
(boldness) Hebrews 4:16 - Let us then approach Gods throne of grace with confidence
(offences) Matthew 18:7 - "Woe to the world because of offences for it must needs be that offences come; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh";;;
(bite) Proverbs 25:15 - "Through patience a ruler can be persuaded, and a gentle tongue can break a bone.";;;

(doves) Song of Solomon 2:14 - O my dove, in the clefts of the rock, in the hiding places on the mountainside, show me your face, let me hear your voice; for your voice is sweet, and your face is lovely.;;;
(veil) 2 Corinthians 3:16 - "But whenever anyone turns to the Lord, the veil is taken away.";;;
(thieves) Luke 12:39 - "But understand this: If the owner of the house had known at what hour the thief was coming, he would not have let his house be broken into.";;;
(oaks) Isaiah 61:3 - to bestow on them a crown of beauty instead of ashes
(fadeth) 1 Peter 1:24 - "For all flesh is as grass, and all the glory of man as the flower of grass. The grass withereth, and the flower thereof falleth away.";;;
